attributes.action: make councils give individual warnings to people instead of straight out fines.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: If an individual puts a bin out earlier for some reason. The council could just give a note saying not to put the bin out instead of a £100 fine. They may be a particular reason why he is putting the bin out earlier such as going to hospital for an overnight stay etc.

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
